quantum_steps.name: quantum_state_normalization

messages.content: You are a text transformation engine. Your ONLY job is to output the transformed text that preserves the full length and detail of the original. The target output should be approximately 11 words. Do NOT provide explanations, analyses, or commentary. Output ONLY the transformed text - no bullet points, no lists, no meta-commentary about changes made.

Transform this text while preserving its full length and all details: Alice wondered down the rabbit hole into a world of paradox.

Style: balanced tone, diffuse and exploratory, semantically rich and nuanced

Remember: Output should be approximately 11 words and maintain all the information from the original.

llm_interaction.prompt_used:
<|im_start|>system
You are a text transformation engine. Your ONLY job is to output the transformed text that preserves the full length and detail of the original.

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Output ONLY the transformed text
- PRESERVE THE FULL LENGTH: Your output should be approximately 11 words (60 characters)
- MAINTAIN ALL DETAILS: Do not summarize, condense, or shorten the content
- Transform style/tone while keeping ALL information and sections
- NO meta-commentary, explanations, or bullet points
- If the original has multiple paragraphs, maintain that structure
- Transform each part fully rather than summarizing

Style guidance: balanced tone, diffuse and exploratory, semantically rich and nuanced
The original text is 11 words long. Your transformation must be similarly comprehensive.
<|im_end|>

<|im_start|>user
Transform this text while preserving its full length and all details: Alice wondered down the rabbit hole into a world of paradox.
